quiz_title: Tell Us How You're Feeling About Work And We'll Tell You What Yoga You Should Practice
quiz_sub: Sometimes there are too many choices. Even choosing the best path to mind-body-spirit balance. Tell us how you are feeling, and we’ll suggest a yoga practice. Once you find the right practice for you, you’ll find your bliss.

result.title: Elephant
result.text: Your totem is the elephant.  Your 1st or root chakra may be out of balance so you may want to try a hatha yoga practice.  Hatha yoga is slow and grounding, creating a good foundation. Be Good to Yourself ConsciousGood.com

result.title: Crocodile
result.text: Your totem is the crocodile.  Your 2nd or sacral spine chakra may be out of balance so you may want to try an Iyengar yoga practice.  Iyengar yoga requires an attention to detail and proper alignment. Be Good to Yourself ConsciousGood.com

result.title: Goat
result.text: Your totem is the goat.  Your 3rd or navel chakra may be out of balance so you may want to try an ashtanga yoga practice.  Ashtanga is a series of postures that build heat in the body and strengthens muscles, especially the core. Be Good to Yourself ConsciousGood.com

result.title: Deer
result.text: Your totem is the deer.  Your 4th or heart chakra may be out of balance so you may want to try a qigong practice.  Qigong – not typically defined as yoga - but it has a powerful impact on balancing mind, body and spirit none the less. Qigong strengthens and heals internal organs. Be Good to Yourself ConsciousGood.com

result.title: Lion
result.text: Your totem is the lion.  Your 5th or throat chakra may be out of balance so you may want to try a pranayama practice.  Practicing pranayama opens the throat and lungs and improves communication. Be Good to Yourself ConsciousGood.com

result.title: Owl
result.text: Your totem is the owl.  Your 6th or third eye chakra may be out of balance so you may want to try a kundalini yoga practice.  Kundalini helps the glands and nervous system and improves intuition.  It’s also a good yoga practice to bring all chakras into balance. Be Good to Yourself ConsciousGood.com

result.title: Butterfly
result.text: Your totem is the lotus flower.  Your 7th or crown chakra may be out of balance so you may want to try a bhakti yoga practice. Bhakti is the yoga of devotion and understanding and will help you to experience “all as one”. Be Good to Yourself ConsciousGood.com

question.text: How do you feel about your weight?

answer.text: I am definitely above or below my ideal weight OR I don’t know my ideal weight.
I am comfortable with my body and I am at my ideal weight.
I am only a few pounds from my ideal weight.

question.text: How do you feel about exercise?

answer.text: I rarely exercise.
I maintain a regular, balance exercise routine.
I am obsessed with exercise.

question.text: How do you feel about your sex life?

answer.text: I have no sex life.
I enjoy an active sex life.
I can’t stop thinking about sex.

question.text: How do you feel about relaxation and recreation?

answer.text: I rarely make time to relax and enjoy myself.
I always find time to relax and enjoy myself.
I can never get enough pleasure.

question.text: How do you feel about responsibility?

answer.text: I am often unable to achieve my goals.
I always set and achieve reasonable goals.
I tend to set and strive for unrealistic goals

question.text: How do you feel about your level of energy?

answer.text: I never seem to have enough energy.
I always have enough energy.
I have so much energy, I have difficulty resting or sleeping.

question.text: How do you feel about your normal state of emotions?

answer.text: I often feel depressed and sad.
I always feel happy and content.
I can sometimes feel ecstatic, but can swing quickly.

question.text: How do you feel about your friendships?

answer.text: I find it difficult to make friends.
I am able to make and keep friends easily.
I have many friends but few close ones.

question.text: How do you feel about your ability to listen well?

answer.text: I find it difficult to listen to others.
I am able to hear what someone is trying to say.
I often interrupt because I think I hear what has not been said.

question.text: How do you feel about your creativity?

answer.text: I have few creative pastimes.
I have several creative outlets.
I am driven by my need to be creative.

question.text: How do you feel about your intuition?

answer.text: I am unable to trust my intuition.
I am often able to access and utilize my intuition.
I am overly reliant on my intuition.

question.text: How do you feel about your dreams?

answer.text: I can never remember my dreams.
I often recall and reflect upon my dreams.
I often have difficulty distinguishing between dreams and reality.

question.text: How do you feel about your personal development?

answer.text: I do not really know myself.
I have spent time getting to know and like myself.
I find it difficult to appreciate anyone beyond myself.

question.text: How do you feel about your spirituality?

answer.text: I have not experienced anyone I would describe as spiritual.
I have integrated one or more profound spiritual experiences.
I have no real interest in anything outside of the spiritual.
